thread.title: GlobalShareWare Releases iFoneMate iPhone Data Recovery Software
thread.title_full: GlobalShareWare Releases iFoneMate iPhone Data Recovery Software

author: prbuzz.com
title: GlobalShareWare Releases iFoneMate iPhone Data Recovery Software
text:
Austin, Texas – GlobalShareWare, an international platform for software downloading, announced today that it has released iFoneMate, an application for iPhone data recovery and iPhone contact recovery. Users can recover lost data from iPhones, retrieve deleted iPhone photos . The iPhone data recovery software allows users restore lost iPhone notes as well. iFoneMate can restore lost or deleted data from iPads and iPod Touch as well as iPhone.
“Data loss on an iOS device can be a big inconvenience or even the cause of financial loss,” said [spokesperson.] “This product gives iPhone users a way to avoid problems from accidental or malicious data loss.”
iFoneMate recovers data which lost due to, such as accidental deletion of a contact, locking devices without passwords, water damage or viruses. Battery replacement can also lead to data loss. Given that most iPhone users do not back up their files, iFoneMate solves a serious potential problem. The application supports all iOS devices, including iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 5S, iPhone 5C, iPhone 5, iPhone 4S, iPhone 4, iPad 2, iPad Air, iPad mini, iPad mini(Retina Display), and the new iPad, iPad 1 and iPod touch 4/5.
For more information, visit http://www.globalshareware.com/ifonemate/
Media Contact
